short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds plots to leveling history, tracks current server status, and maintains voting history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web extension for the MapleLegends website. Adds an icon for visibility into server status and account details. Maintain a local voting history. Also injects a plot on the leveling history.
